Upacāla：Son of Upacālā and nephew ofSāriputta andKhadiravaniya-Revata．

He was ordained by Revata （Thag．v，43； ThagA．i．110）．

He is mentioned in the Anguttara Nikāya （v．133） in a list of very eminent disciples，together with Cāla，Kakkata，Kalimbha，Nikata andKatissaha．They lived in theKūtāgārasālā in Vesāli，but when theLicchavis went there to visit the Buddha，they moved to the Gosingasālavana in search of quiet．
